attributes.title: Manifest Powers to Remember Sadashivatva ‘You are Sadashiva’
attributes.description:
Paramahamsa Nithyananda describes a new, amazing spiritual continuing education program for all Shuddhadvaita program and Inner Awakening graduates. 
Not only will he be helping graduates manifest deeper powers, He will be gifting the sacred Garbha, which holds the bioenergy of Sadashiva, to all those who enroll! 

Paramahamsa Nithyananda describes the Nithyananda University course: “It’s about getting grounded in Sadashivatva, which is Existential Reality. If you are building 
your self-worth based in money, girlfriend, boyfriend, your wealth or your car, that is what I call Matrix personality. If you are building yourself based on integrity, 
your spiritual ability, your strength, that is what is based on SADSHIVATVA. You just need to align yourself to Existential Reality.” 

Use Sadashiva to change your whole life as you want. Your identity about you will change. Sadashivatva will become life; manifesting powers will become your 
everyday experience!
(November 3, 2016)

Manifesting Powers is Sadashivatva:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gkoma3X0xRI
